column4: I need to put a program on my computer that doesn't have an internet connection, I see it in synaptic on this computer, does anyone know the best way of going about this?
is that to make a wireless device work, just curious?
from the looks of it, the bcm driver you need is on the install CD, do you still have it?
yes, but when I put the install cd into my notebook, the "cd inserted appears to have programs on it, run synaptic?" doesn't appear any more
open synaptic, search for the bcm driver you need, highlight and start to install it.
open synaptic, click Settings/repos/third party tab.. ake sure the two CD ROm boxes are checked.
but did the driver install, or are you still requiring a connection?
still trying to get the driver off of the cd
I'm just going to go play some wesnoth, maybe it'll fix itself :(
well, i doubt it will fix itself, but good luck..lol
